message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Your share is decreasing faster than mine. Let's be reasonable, this is a good deal for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a bigger share
The clock is ticking, Alice. This offer is fair and lets us both walk away with something.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer
Alice, let's be realistic. This is a fair split and time is running out. Any more delays benefit neither of us.
